comments.body: in this case, the extension is found one directory under, `ruby_http_parser`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@    - gem install --norc -l -V --ignore-dependencies {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
    - gem unpack {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
    - make -C {{ PREFIX }}/lib/ruby/gems/{{ ruby }}.0/gems/{{ name }}-{{ version }}/ext/ruby_http_parser clean
  skip: {{ win }}
